brand.name: Stryker
brand.description: Bangladesh’s first sugar-free electrolyte drink developed in Germany and made for Bangladesh.
taglines: Developed in Germany – Made for Bangladesh

testimonials.name: Snigdho
testimonials.quote: Stryker keeps me focused and energized throughout my long-distance runs. With no sugar and clean electrolytes, it gives my body exactly what it needs.

testimonials.name: Dr. Neon
testimonials.quote: In the gym, every set and rep matters. Stryker gives me a clean boost with zero sugar and essential electrolytes.

testimonials.name: Steve Long
testimonials.quote: Healthy hydration options were hard to find in Bangladesh, so I created Stryker. Developed in Germany, it’s packed with clean electrolytes and zero sugar.

community.name: Stryker Running Club
community.description: Weekly and bi-weekly running events open to all fitness levels focused on movement, community, and hydration.

career_intro.headline: Join the Movement. Fuel the Nation.
career_intro.description: We’re here to shake up the drink industry — with bold ideas, zero sugar, and full-on hydration. Stryker is for the new Bangladesh.

why_work_with_us.title: Why Work with Stryker?
why_work_with_us.description: At Stryker, we’re not just creating drinks — we’re building a movement. From launching Bangladesh’s first zero-sugar electrolyte drink to running community fitness events and expanding across platforms, everything we do is bold, fast-paced, and purpose-driven. Joining Stryker means becoming part of a team that values innovation, impact, and personal growth.

why_work_with_us.title: Startup Vibes with Real Impact
why_work_with_us.description: We move fast, think big, and take action. Every team member plays a vital role in shaping the brand. Your work won’t be lost in layers of bureaucracy — it will be seen, felt, and celebrated.

why_work_with_us.title: Collaborative & Open Culture
why_work_with_us.description: We believe in transparency, teamwork, and mutual respect. Great ideas can come from anywhere, and we encourage everyone — from interns to leads — to speak up, contribute, and grow together.

why_work_with_us.title: Continuous Learning
why_work_with_us.description: At Stryker, you’ll never stop learning. Whether it’s product development, brand storytelling, customer engagement, or fitness culture — you’ll be exposed to real challenges and equipped with the tools to solve them.

why_work_with_us.title: Passion Meets Purpose
why_work_with_us.description: We’re passionate about a better lifestyle for our generation. If you’re excited about health, branding, community, or just love what we do — you’ll fit right in.

why_work_with_us.title: People Come First
why_work_with_us.description: From flexible work policies to fun team hangouts, we care about the people behind the brand. You’ll find a team that works hard, laughs harder, and supports one another — inside and outside the office.

open_positions.headline: Current Openings
open_positions.description: Be a part of our journey! Check out our open positions and find the one that aligns with your skills and aspirations.

positions.title: Graphic Designer
positions.notes: If you’re passionate about what we do and think you’d be a great fit, send us your CV anyway. We’re always open to meeting people who can make Stryker better.

open_positions.general_note: Didn’t find a role? We still want to hear from you. Send us your CV anyway.

perks_and_benefits.headline: Perks & Benefits
perks_and_benefits.description: We believe great work happens when people feel great — physically, mentally, and emotionally. That’s why we offer a mix of serious perks and not-so-serious (but still awesome) extras to keep you hydrated, happy, and hyped.

perks_and_benefits.title: Competitive Salary
perks_and_benefits.description: With performance reviews after 6 months, and the opportunity for a salary increase based on results.

perks_and_benefits.title: Wellness Support
perks_and_benefits.description: Access to our running club, yoga sessions, and more.

perks_and_benefits.title: Snacks on Snacks
perks_and_benefits.description: Because hydration is a lifestyle, not just a drink.

perks_and_benefits.title: Free “Murgi Squad” T-Shirts
perks_and_benefits.description: Courses, mentorship, and a front-row seat to a growing brand.

perks_and_benefits.title: Learning Opportunities
perks_and_benefits.description: Hydration? Handled. Take home as much as you can carry (literally).

perks_and_benefits.title: Unlimited Stryker
perks_and_benefits.description: Random Awards That Mean Nothing but Feel Good. “Best Desk Plant Caregiver”, anyone?

perks_and_benefits.title: Team Photoshoots
perks_and_benefits.description: Yes, we make you pose like a startup influencer. Sorry, not sorry.

perks_and_benefits.title: Movie Nights & Meme Wars
perks_and_benefits.description: All part of team bonding (and slightly too competitive).

perks_and_benefits.title: Culture
perks_and_benefits.description: We work hard, hydrate harder, and know when to laugh at ourselves. If you’re into good vibes, great products, and doing meaningful work — we might just be your people.

promotions.title: Come join the squad
promotions.description: Get your exclusive STRYKER deal on WhatsApp.
promotions.privacy_notice: With the confirmation you accept our privacy policy and stay up to date via e-mail.

addresses.label: Office Address 2

call_to_actions.description: Got questions or want to order? Just ask Bristy on WhatsApp.

brand_message.description: STRYKER is the alternative to sugary electrolyte drinks. With STRYKER you finally get amazing taste with a good feeling.
